ComicInfo.Series: Victor Crowley's Hatchet Halloween Tales II
ComicInfo.Summary:
Its Halloween in Honey Island Swamp again! A time when the ghosts of the dead roam freely and Victor Crowley must turn his rage against the minions of the underworld. This year's volume of violence includes three stories of All Hallow's Eve including a NEW ORIGINAL STORY BY HATCHET CREATOR & FILMMAKER ADAM GREEN! In "Which Way to Honey Island Swamp" Green tells the story of three very unlucky witches intruding on Victory Crowley's swamp. Jason Pell (Beware the Witch's Shadow) returns with "Dimitri Fought A Bear" and horror and splatter veteran James Kuhoric (Freddy vs Jason vs Ash) caps it off with the tragic tale of "Weed." Plus a horrific Halloween bonus - our holiday fun pages are back with a bloody vengeance! This issue is chock full of frights and fun! Victor Crowley's Hatchet Halloween II is available with three covers - Main by Roy Allan Martinez, Carved by Richard Bonk, and Racy by Mike Wolfer!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Main Cover | Roy Allan Martinez | 1 | B | Carved Variant Cover | Rich Bonk | 2 | C | Racy Variant Cover | Mike Wolfer | 3 |
